author: Sarah Young, Sarah Young
title: Coronavirus: Are reusable shopping bags safe to use in supermarkets?
description: People have become increasingly concerned about the risk of exposure to the virus while doing their shopping
content:
With lockdown conditions imposed on the UK, the majority of the nations daily routines have come to halt.
But, while people have been advised to keep activities such as food shopping to a bare minimum, supermarkets remain one of the few places still open dur… [+7277 chars]
